name: Profile + CTA Btn
description: Displays a person's profile with their name, photo, and contact information. It is designed to facilitate immediate actions like placing a call or sending a message. It can be used to show a single contact or as part of a list for multiple contacts.
examples: Show me John Smith's contact info.
Show me the contacts for my project team.
Let me know the today's schedule and call my next meeting.

component_title.description: A brief title, typically used when displaying a group of contacts (e.g., 'Family', 'Project Team').

profile_thumbnail_img.description: The thumbnail image to the person's profile picture.

text_name.description: The full name of the person.

text_number.description: The person's phone number or primary contact detail, used for the call/message actions.

text_cta.description: The text for the Call-to-Action button (e.g., 'Call with {name}', 'Call Now', 'Message Now').
